query:
UPDATE v2_job_flow_runtime SET
                    flow_status = jsonb_set(
                        jsonb_set(flow_status, ARRAY['modules', $3::INTEGER::TEXT, 'job'], to_jsonb($1::UUID::TEXT)),
                        ARRAY['modules', $3::INTEGER::TEXT, 'type'],
                        to_jsonb('InProgress'::text)
                    )
                WHERE id = $2
